name: Creative Space Redcliffe
description: A welcoming creative arts and crafts group in Redcliffe, Bristol. Monthly drop-in sessions for all abilities, plus special creative events.

events.name: Temple Church Drawing Club
events.details: A special drawing event series running until July. Advance booking is required.

time.details: Every Tuesday from 10 June - 15 July. Part of the Insane Root Theatre community programme.

location.address: Temple Church, Victoria St, Redcliffe, Bristol BS1 6HS

booking.details: Advance booking required via the event website.

events.name: Monthly Creative Group Drop-In
events.details: A welcoming creative arts and crafts group. Free tea and coffee. Bring your own creative projects or join in with group activities. All abilities welcome. This group has paused until August, but please do join the drawing club in the meantime.

location.address: Redcliffe Methodist Church, Prewett St, Redcliffe, Bristol BS1 6PB

booking.details: No booking required, just drop in.
